column4: Hello I need some help I want to Install JAVA SE on ubuntu anyone that can help there are only rpm and tar.gz on oracles java site
you can extract the tar.gz and run the installer herein. oracles java is unfortunately no longer supported due to bad licencing
I tried to do that but it promts me to this: There is only one alternative in link group java: /usr/lib/jvm/java-6-openjdk/jre/bin/java
